name: Healthy Hires
overview:
We are a leading provider of skilled contract professionals to clients in the life sciences, and healthcare industries. We offer contract, contract-to-hire and direct-hire placements for local and travel assignments.

We Provide you with re’sume’s to be excited about, showing what you’re doing with your life? We know how you feel.

Healthy Hires is real executive recruiters working in the current job market. We don’t just write how-to career books. We live it every day.

So you really want a better job? We can Help you write better resumes, better interviews? It’s all in there. But first, take a look at my information on the discussion board and let’s see what you really want to do with your life. Then, let’s get to work!
